title: Not receiving Hextech chest
body: I've made several S and A+ in game and received no chest. I haven't been able to open any for the month. I'm in game with friends and they receive chest while I do not.

replies.body:
There are some restrictions and qualifications in order to earn chests while you play.  We have a [Hextech Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233) that goes into these qualifications/restrictions in-depth that should shed some light on why you aren't receiving any.

If you still have any questions, reply back and let me know!
